base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three equally sized drawers stacked vertically, each with a handle centered horizontally. The cabinet is rectangular with flat surfaces and sharp edges.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the cabinet on rails, allowing for smooth movement. Each drawer is designed to fit snugly within the cabinet, with handles facilitating easy access.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk, providing storage for various items. Users interact with it by pulling the handles to access the contents of each drawer.
